changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO aircrafts (call_sign, seating_capacity, luxury_seats, model, is_new_aircraft, classes) VALUES ('A380', 853, 87, 'Airbus A380', true, 'FIRST, BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('B747', 524, 74, 'Boeing 747', true, 'FIRST, BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('B787', 335, 30, 'Boeing 787', true, 'BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('A350', 440, 40, 'Airbus A350', true, 'BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('E190', 114, 16, 'Embraer E190', true, 'ECONOMY'), ('MD-80', 172, 14, 'McDonnell Douglas MD-80', false, 'ECONOMY'), ('B737', 126, 8, 'Boeing 737', true, 'ECONOMY'), ('A321', 240, 24, 'Airbus A321', true, 'BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('A330', 277, 28, 'Airbus A330', true, 'FIRST, BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('B777', 346, 44, 'Boeing 777', true, 'FIRST, BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('B757', 200, 10, 'Boeing 757', true, 'ECONOMY'), ('CRJ200', 50, 5, 'Bombardier CRJ200', false, 'ECONOMY'), ('A220', 135, 15, 'Airbus A220', true, 'BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('ERJ145', 50, 5, 'Embraer ERJ145', false, 'ECONOMY'), ('DC-9', 110, 10, 'Douglas DC-9', false, 'ECONOMY'), ('B717', 117, 9, 'Boeing 717', true, 'ECONOMY'), ('B787-10', 330, 32, 'Boeing 787-10', true, 'BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('A340', 335, 34, 'Airbus A340', false, 'BUSINESS, ECONOMY'), ('B737 MAX', 200, 8, 'Boeing 737 MAX', true, 'ECONOMY'), ('A380-800', 555, 87, 'Airbus A380-800', true, 'FIRST, BUSINESS, ECONOMY');
